descriptionlist.description: Only tested in iOS 9.3.3, but should work in any iOS 9 version.

Experimental release, VERY EARLY BETA
This is a tweak to enhance hotspot features, there is only one feature for now!
This tweak prevents you from connecting to any networks while tethering your connection, even intentionally, I DARE YOU TO TRY AND CONNECT TO A NETWORK. More features planned, and suggestions are welcome. :)
All jokes aside, I look forward to any feedback or suggestions, so please contact me through my e-mail or through reddit in /u/BrunoNFL.

No options to configure from settings.
